subsection_title: Diagnostic Procedures Ordered By Persons Other Than Physicians
rules: Diagnostic procedures are insured when referred by authorized practitioners.
Procedures must be rendered in an ICHSC or hospital to be insured.
notes: Midwives and Aboriginal Midwives can refer for diagnostic ultrasounds for pregnancy.
Nurse Practitioners can refer for various diagnostic procedures if authorized.
Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeons can refer for diagnostic procedures related to dental surgical procedures.
